description: Head of Ops at Series A Fintech, ex-Oliver Wyman
content:
# EMMA HARTLEY
London, UK | emma.hartley@email.com | +44 7700 900123 | linkedin.com/in/emmahartley

---

## **Professional Experience**

**Kova** (Series A Fintech) | London, UK
**Head of Operations** | Sep 2021 – Present
• Joined as employee #8 when we had ~£400k ARR; now north of £3m with 55 people
• Established operations function from zero: customer onboarding, internal workflows, cross-functional processes
• Grew ops and customer success teams from 2 to 10 over 18 months
• Built data infrastructure using SQL and Python for automated reporting and metrics
• Work daily with engineering and product on analytics, dashboards, and process automation

**Oliver Wyman** | London, UK
**Consultant** | Jul 2018 – Aug 2021
• Advised financial services and tech clients on operational strategy and transformation
• Led workstreams on process optimization, market entry, and business model design
• Picked up SQL and Python during this time to support analytical work

---

## **Education**

**Durham University** | Durham, UK
BA Economics, First Class Honours | 2015 – 2018
• Dissertation: "Digital Payment Adoption in Emerging Markets" (Distinction)
• Economics Society Vice President

---

## **Skills**

Technical: SQL (advanced), Python (intermediate), Excel/Sheets, Looker, Jira, Notion
Languages: English (native), Spanish (conversational)

description: Product Strategy Lead at Series B Edtech, ex-PwC
content:
# MATTHEW MILLS
London, UK | matthew.mills@email.com | +44 7700 900678 | linkedin.com/in/matthewmills

---

## **Professional Experience**

**Learnly** (Series B Edtech) | London, UK
**Product Strategy Lead** | Jun 2021 – Present
• Spearheaded launch of enterprise product vertical from concept to market within established infrastructure
• Built structured interview process and assessment frameworks, reducing time-to-hire by ~40%
• Managed team of 8 across product, design, and analytics over 12 months
• Work closely with engineering and design on product roadmap and delivery
• Use Looker and Excel for analytics

**PwC Strategy&** | London, UK
**Consultant** | Sep 2019 – May 2021
• Advised education and tech clients on growth strategy and market entry
• Led quantitative analysis and business case development
• Built skills in Excel, PowerPoint, and basic data analysis

---

## **Education**

**University of Bristol** | Bristol, UK
BA Philosophy, Politics & Economics, 2:1 | 2016 – 2019
• Dissertation on education policy (Merit)
• Bristol Consulting Society - Member

---

## **Skills**

Technical: Looker, Excel/Sheets (advanced), SQL (basic), Jira, Asana
Languages: English (native)

# MICHAEL BRENNAN
London, UK | michael.brennan@email.com | +44 7700 900901 | linkedin.com/in/michaelbrennan

## Professional Experience

### Dwellio (Proptech Startup) — London, UK
**Co-Founder & CEO** | Jan 2022 – Jun 2023
- Co-founded proptech platform via Entrepreneur First (UK talent investor backing individuals pre-team/pre-idea)
- Raised £400k pre-seed from angels and EF; reached ~1,500 users before deciding to wind down
- Led product development and go-to-market with technical co-founder
- Taught myself basic SQL for user analytics; owned product specs and user research
- Built team to 5 people (2 engineers, 2 sales, 1 ops)

**Jun 2023 – Sep 2023:** Took time to travel and reset after company wind-down

### Accenture Strategy — London, UK
**Strategy Consultant** | Sep 2018 – Dec 2021
- Advised FS and tech clients on corporate strategy
- Led market analysis and competitive intelligence workstreams
- Developed business cases and strategic recommendations for C-suite

## Education

### University of Manchester — Manchester, UK
BA Business Studies, First Class Honours | 2015 – 2018
- Dissertation: "Digital Disruption in Real Estate Markets" (Distinction)
- Manchester Entrepreneurs Society - Member

## Skills

Technical: SQL (basic), Excel/Sheets (advanced), Figma (for product design)
Languages: English (native)
